intro: Meliosma yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan meliosma, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rhamnaceae and is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves with a distinctive pale green underside. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in racemes, typically blooming in late spring. It prefers shaded, moist environments and is often found in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
